dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, definitely! Big news for Moldova, actually. The FCB – that's the First Credit Bureau, right? – they've teamed up with Infodebit from Moldova to launch international FICO Scores there.

dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! The very same. So now, like, banks, micro-finance organizations, even telecom operators in Moldova, can use these scores for, uh, decision-making.

dialogue_turns.text: That's smart, especially with all the data privacy stuff these days. I saw a quote here from Ruslan Omarov from FCB, talking about developing "proprietary expertise" and using "best practices." Sounds like they're really pushing their own capabilities.

dialogue_turns.text: They are! And they've been an official FICO provider since, like, 2014, with licenses across a bunch of Central Asian countries, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, and now Moldova, obviously. They're pretty big on predictive analytics and machine learning.
